show_name: Carried by the Wind: Tsukikage Ran (TV)
other_title: Tsukikage Ran - Carried by the Wind
plot: In the Edo or Tokugawa period (1600-1868),Ran,a female wandering samurai whose skill with the katana is only matched by her taste for sake (rice wine),is joined by a chinese martial artist who calls herself Lady Meow of the Iron Cat Fist.Together,these two women face antagonists of all kinds.
opening_theme: "Leave it to the wind" by Akemi Misawa
ending_theme: "Leave it to the Wind 2" by Reiko Yasuhara
